column1: Chris Krebs is a true patriot. He was instrumental in us having one of the most secure elections in history despite bad actors trying to influence our elections. His service should have been rewarded not dismissed.

It’s time to come together. America has spoken and we must respect the decision. More unites us than divides us; we can find common ground. I hope the president-elect can embody this. I wish him good luck and I wish the president a successful final few weeks. God bless the USA!

A sitting president undermining our political process & questioning the legality of the voices of countless Americans without evidence is not only dangerous & wrong it undermines the very foundation this nation was built upon. Every American should have his or her vote counted.

Closing the cybersecurity workforce gap requires a targeted approach & that includes diversity. @NSAgov & DoD’s new initiative targets the gap by focusing on HBCUs & MSIs across the country to access new pools of talent. This is how we win in cyberspace. https://t.co/nwjIOKGbOH

Bringing US troops home from Afghanistan before the job is done is dangerous. American troops are making a difference. If we remove them it could create a power vacuum for those looking to take advantage of the situation. Wrong move at the wrong time. https://t.co/bTlNgqoRWT

Journalism across mediums has been hit hard due to COVID-19. Thank you to @MSFTIssues for supporting journalists in #ElPaso & around the country with your new initiative to preserve & protect a vital aspect of our democracy. We must keep journalism alive! https://t.co/dkwWk28hv1

America leads the world in innovation but to keep up we must embrace artificial intelligence in the gov’t private sector & education. I joined @SIRIUSXM’s @juliemason to discuss the vital need for a national AI strategy. Listen to the full interview: https://t.co/lxCHLyTIvM

I wish the President First Lady and all Americans battling Covid-19 well and a speedy recovery.   Covid-19 has always been a real threat to lives everywhere. We must wear masks & take precautions.    Thankfully America has the best and the brightest providing medical care.

Countering a global threat is easier when you have friends.    This partnership with one of our oldest allies will help ensure democratic principles are reflected in AI not those of an authoritarian regime such as the CCP. https://t.co/pfXWHpM7qJ

We can’t let an authoritarian regime like China decide the global rules & norms on AI. My resolution with @RepRobinKelly on a national AI strategy asserts Congress’ role in advancing AI so American values are reflected in this emerging technology. https://t.co/815lxLTwJ3

American leadership in artificial intelligence is no longer guaranteed but through congressional action we can sustain being at the forefront of this emerging technology & continue fostering innovation. Read more in my joint column with @RepRobinKelly: https://t.co/815lxLTwJ3

Justice Ginsburg’s passion for the law unwavering commitment to her country & family & incredible character inspire men & women around the globe.   American law will never be the same without her. She had an incredible enduring effect on our country. She will be dearly missed.
Shutting down the Internet is a dictator’s last and futile attempt to cling to power.    I stand with the freedom loving people of Belarus.   https://t.co/GoLKaHw1nN

To retain America’s edge in artificial intelligence & secure the next 70 years of American-led prosperity & security we need a cohesive forward-looking plan on AI. Thanks to our work with @BPC_Bipartisan we intro’d a national AI strategy to achieve this. https://t.co/quDo3E74sD
Putin once said that the leader in AI will rule the world. We cannot allow Russia or China to be that leader.   America must lead the way. This will ensure our values shape AI.

AI is the future and America must embrace it to maintain our global leadership in innovation. We must take advantage of tech before it takes advantage of us.   Today @RepRobinKelly and I introduced a resolution calling for the creation of a national AI strategy. https://t.co/Dv5yvU69aO

Artificial intelligence is the future.   This means preparing America’s workforce countering our adversaries’ commitment to AI investing in R&D shaping the ethical guidelines and rules of AI based on America’s values. https://t.co/quDo3DPtB5

One of my biggest mistakes happened early in my career but the lessons learned from that mistake have had a far greater effect. Check out @MarkGraban's podcast My Favorite Mistake to hear more. https://t.co/Mj7oUzpdc9

Representing over 800 miles of the border my constituents and I understand the importance of our nation’s relationship with Mexico. I joined @USMexicoFound to discuss our bilateral relationship and how we can work together far into the future. Listen in: https://t.co/9Ud47eB5YK

Today it’s important we again remember the lives lost & changed forever when a gunman took out his anger on West Texas communities.    Texans are resilient working together to heal. Our communities are still mourning but we’re also growing stronger.  https://t.co/TcMJVWnqab
We are the world leaders in AI research but China is challenging that leadership. Here are next steps to ensure we continue to lead the world in AI: https://t.co/o9mT6BcIC4
✅A Billion-dollar bet on AI and quantum. ✅$20 Million AI investment in Texas. ✅Public-Private Partnership.  Now let’s do more to ensure America keeps leading the way. https://t.co/C9Bvyq3c3A

What happened to Jacob Blake is unbelievable. We must prevent officers who can or will use violence from being on the street on the force. Dpts. & all levels of gov't must make changes. But violence won't give Jacob use of his legs or prevent this from happening to someone else.

No one should be shot in the back repeatedly.   Watching Jacob Blake get shot makes me sick.   I cannot fathom how his kids felt.   Thank God he is alive.   I support a thorough investigation into this and the firing of any police who use such brutal violent tactics.

I’ve worked with @RepRobinKelly & @BPC_Bipartisan over the past year to develop concrete steps policymakers can take to advance the development of artificial intelligence. Tune in tomorrow at 3:30pm ET to learn more about our national strategy on AI: https://t.co/F1JjS01hVh

Exercising our civic duty in unprecedented times requires unprecedented measures. The solution is for every state to allow voters to request a mail-in ballot due to COVID-19 health risks not haphazardly mailing out ballots.

We should make it easier to vote not put up barriers to voting. A politician that is afraid of losing an election because of an increase in the electorate needs to rethink his or her strategy on connecting with voters. Don’t be afraid of the electorate appeal to them.

If Speaker Pelosi was serious about helping the US Postal Service she would bring a bipartisan bill like the Postal Service Reform Act of 2017 to the floor for a vote. Meaningful solutions have been proposed but Dem leadership has failed to make these necessary reforms a reality.

The US Postal Service is vital. They provide prescriptions absentee ballots a method to pay bills and so much more to the American people and they’re doing this throughout the pandemic. They are essential and like always I will continue to support them.

The 21st century can be another American century but only if our nation focuses on a strategic foreign policy to meet the geopolitical threats we face head-on. We must strengthen our alliances lead on emerging technologies and give more than we take. https://t.co/YAwak0lxuL

We are in a technology arms race with China and one of the main areas is artificial intelligence. AI will change society and the way we live which is why we can’t let an authoritarian gov’t lead the way. More from my discussion with @FederalNewsNet: https://t.co/mfwiYreFax

By providing additional funds for state & local governments to update & secure their IT systems we are enabling governments to help folks recover from COVID-19 & advance once the pandemic is history. We must bring this infrastructure into the 21st century.https://t.co/c0gD6fXxPI

The agreement between Israel and the UAE is welcome news for the region’s stability & a great step toward normalized relations. This is a major breakthrough and I hope this deal can serve as a model in improving relationships with other major Arab states. https://t.co/obhdshb9F3

Every industry is going to be impacted by artificial intelligence & whoever masters AI is going to master the world. @USAA and @UTSA are leading the way in #SanAntonio but we also need a national plan for the U.S. to lead. More on a national AI strategy with @News4SA: https://t.co/4U0iQ7yRWl

I didn’t trust the Iranian regime when the nuclear deal went into effect and I see fewer reasons to trust them now. Combining their malicious intent with the ability to import arms would be a significant threat to our national security. https://t.co/ufTZLojs6K

I’m sad to hear the news this morning of the three Texas Park and Wildlife officers and contract pilot who lost their lives in a helicopter accident in Brewster County. My heart goes out to the friends and families of these four individuals as they mourn their loss.

China continues to be the greatest geopolitical threat the U.S. faces. If we do not begin investing in research & development for AI while China is accelerating we will surely fall behind. https://t.co/hxoKKQzsAO

.@NADB_BDAN remains an incredible partner in our communities. Along with @EPA they make projects like the one in Marathon a reality. I will continue to advocate for critical programs that improve the communities where my constituents live work and raise their families. https://t.co/nEPadyayN1

For the first time ever in 2019 China was on track to outpace the U.S. in spending on R&D. For the U.S. to maintain a strategic advantage we cannot let this trend continue. We must encourage investments in R&D for AI. https://t.co/OR3Wxmycq6

1 year ago today a tragedy and act of terrorism struck our community in El Paso. Yesterday today and tomorrow we remember the 23 innocent lives lost during the senseless act of violence and ensure their legacy lives on. El Paso we are brave and resilient. We are #ElPasoStrong. https://t.co/8UJcvxQFmN
Allowing an adversary to connect to our power grid would enable them to spoof the system’s monitoring tools to falsely think activity is happening on the grid. https://t.co/rgTvm62Q5F

A company owned by a member of the CCP may gain access to our power grid through a large wind farm in the Devil’s River Areas of West Texas. The fed gov't is not moving fast enough to prevent it & the state gov't lacks the power to stop it. https://t.co/rgTvm62Q5F
When it comes to elections only Congress has the authority to change them. The election date should not move. https://t.co/TfdeczBxzI
American adversaries are investing in AI. If we fail to do the same we could face heightened national security threats. We can’t let that happen. https://t.co/zSb0047oqU
I’m lucky to have called John Lewis a friend. https://t.co/qcGCCq2Dk8

There is a big missing piece in the Smithsonian museums: the stories of the American Latino. With today's House vote we are closer to building the National Museum of the American Latino & cementing protecting & honoring the stories history & culture that helped make America. https://t.co/wVGMEc0TvQ

Covid-19 is a worldwide problem but China is stealing IP to thwart research efforts—one of the reasons their Houston consulate was closed.   Now they are retaliating because they got caught. https://t.co/TLsYcH6bbp

We need a national AI strategy to keep America the global leader in advanced technology.   China is trying to surpass us by stealing our IP which got their consulate closed down.  https://t.co/U9A7B0AXZL
The perfect place to build a Tesla Cybertruck? Texas of course. https://t.co/2RecCKYBLt

To maintain a strong economy and national defense America must preserve our technological edge including in artificial intelligence. We must be prepared for this tech disruption with a cohesive long-term strategy not a fragmented approach. https://t.co/U9A7B0AXZL

Artificial intelligence is the future of the world’s economy & every American should have the opportunity to thrive in it. @RepRobinKelly @BPC_Bipartisan and I released our first white paper today on a national AI strategy. Check it out: https://t.co/1sQtOFfjFi

If it weren’t for the bravery of John Lewis it’s likely I wouldn't have the privilege to be a U.S. Congressman. And as a black man I’m not sure I would have the same rights as my fellow countrymen. John Lewis shaped this country in immeasurable ways and will not be forgotten. https://t.co/b5GkBlpMKd

Confederate statues don’t belong in the U.S. Capitol. Anyone committing treason against this great experiment we call America in order to keep slavery alive doesn't deserve a place in a building that represents freedom and unity.
The House passed NDAA provides critical funding for our troops gives them a much-deserved pay raise and ensures our national security. https://t.co/HvvrTROOJb
This should have happened in 1865.  https://t.co/72EPn6773c

DACA recipients came to the US through no fault of their own & are now building businesses paying taxes going to school.   @RepPeteAguilar & I introduced an amendment during markup to prevent federal $$$  from being used to remove detain or deny work authorization of Dreamers. https://t.co/0LUC86r1kj

.@NBA @UFC & @MLB have thorough processes to screen players & coaches including tests every day but some suggest teachers and school kids just wash their hands & stay home if sick.   How about we value teachers and kids the way we do the athletes we enjoy watching on TV?

After chats with teachers I’m afraid reopening our schools will be a debacle—I hope I’m wrong.   Instead of threatening to withhold funds Dept of Ed should be working with states and school districts on how to EXCEED @CDCgov protocols.

Rescinding the guidance on international students was the right call.   America should seek to  encourage the best and the brightest minds to study in our country not force them out.    https://t.co/sTSWv7EFf2

Japan and our other allies near the South China Sea need America to stand firmly in their corner.  Prime Minister Abe is right.   COVID-19 has made China even more of a security threat.  https://t.co/5WBiNidBu2

The Chinese Communist Party's efforts to become the next world power have escalated to a new and dangerous level.    An economic relationship of this scale between China and Iran will not only endanger America but all our allies in the Middle East.   https://t.co/XdrCvndZkS

🚨Censorship🚨 🚨Book bans🚨 🚨Unfettered surveillance🚨   The new reality Chairman Xi is imposing on the formerly free City of Hong Kong.    The CCP's failure to uphold its intl. commitments for Hong Kong's autonomy demand the attention of the free world. https://t.co/h5ETGXo2Mn

We should be demanding answers from WHO not retreating.    I support holding the WHO accountable & improving it with our allies & partners so it’s more effective in the next major public health crisis.   Leaving the WHO is the wrong decision for America.  https://t.co/MNZgGotERl

Spc. Vanessa Guillen’s disappearance should have been investigated as soon as she went missing. Vanessa Guillen & her family deserve justice & answers.    Proud to join my colleagues in calling for an IG review into her disappearance & murder. https://t.co/iHSspGbr0R

We’ve seen a growing need for food security during #COVID19 and I’m working with several organizations on solving this issue. Listen to @NoKidHungry’s podcast @AddPassionStir with @billshore to hear more. https://t.co/rgGcfg668C

The world must work together to stop the CCP's destructive inhumane treatment of Uighurs.  Their efforts to place Uighurs in internment camps coupled with forced sterilization and birth control is ethnic cleansing.  https://t.co/yDSqSvbNdv

The Russian government is not our ally they are our adversary. Their goal is to sow mistrust and discord and they’re succeeding. We cannot allow them to continue this scheme. @OutFrontCNN https://t.co/5jvZBKuJZn
TUNE IN 📺 to @CNN at 7:20 pm (et). I’ll be joining @OutFrontCNN’s @ErinBurnett to discuss Russia and Afghanistan.

Great news for #TX23! The more than $5 million in funding will provide airports in our district with the means to make necessary improvements bettering travel for our residents. Check out the news: https://t.co/QjSuMjJUMe

House Democrats’ policing bill missed a key provision empowering police chiefs to permanently fire bad officers. But the bill is also a step forward in addressing much needed reforms which is why I ultimately voted in favor. Read more: https://t.co/83cGlm4I55
Congratulations @RepGallagher! I'm so happy for you and your family. I’m sure you’ll be a great dad.  https://t.co/PHv3OqiWWO

Senate Democrats let down thousands of protestors by blocking police reform yesterday.  I wish House Democrats allowed Republicans to contribute and amend the bill before us today because we need to empower police chiefs to permanently fire bad cops.  https://t.co/C8DPh3KkJC

Cyber threats continue to evolve and we need a dedicated official focused on our nation’s cybersecurity which is critical to our economy and national security. Glad to join @JimLangevin @RepGallagher and other colleagues in introducing this bill. https://t.co/kVpi50btjT

Joined @ReaganInstitute to discuss my service in the @CIA the perspective it’s given me during my time serving in Congress and police reforms to prevent another injustice. Check out the new episode of #Reaganism: https://t.co/LX6AODX1tR
Inspiring innovation. So glad some of this incredible development is happening here in #Texas with @blueorigin https://t.co/Hv1rGCrgzJ

Joined @dpletka and @marcthiessen for their @AEI podcast @AEI_WTHIGO to discuss police reforms that need to be made to prevent another injustice like what happened to George Floyd. Check out our discussion: https://t.co/nCu5D2JiZj

SCOTUS' decision reinforces the fact Congress must enact a permanent legislative solution for DACA recipients so they can continue to be part of communities they have always called home. Speaker Pelosi Leader McConnell it is beyond time for bipartisan bicameral action on DACA. https://t.co/ElxdQANZTW

The executive order is a step in the right direction toward providing the training & tools to make our communities safer. As we work toward legislation these changes should be permanently implemented ensuring they continue far beyond this administration. https://t.co/atDIW1tR9S

These provocations demonstrate the weak position of the North Korean regime.   Until Kim Jong Un returns to the negotiating table the US and our allies must continue to fully implement sanctions and work together to denuclearize the Korean Peninsula.  https://t.co/cMkMcqikJw

As Russia continues to threaten our friends reducing US forces in Germany makes us less secure.    To ensure we have 70 more years of peace & prosperity in Europe the US & our NATO allies must remain committed to deterring common threats to our values.  https://t.co/SZivjmscNF
The Supreme Court got this one right.   You shouldn't discriminate against the LGBTQ community.  #PrideMonth #SCOTUS   https://t.co/yZih5djpSX

From #SanAntonio to #ElPaso and communities in between we have shown our outrage over the killing of George Floyd. In this edition of Hurd on the Hill I outline 3 key things we can do to prevent another injustice. Read how we make our communities safer: https://t.co/yTOYvooADF

Mental health training is a best practice more police departments should expand. My hometown of San Antonio has five times the training of most other departments which only require about 8 hours. https://t.co/Tc78ODoVrG

We need police in communities before something bad even occurs because their role is to protect and serve.   Police have community relationships. These relationships make a difference & it’s why you see officers marching with their neighbors against this injustice. https://t.co/1l8bMm3woc

We know what great police forces are doing in this country.   Let’s tie federal funding to the use of best police practices like those compiled by @CALEA_org.   We can update tactics and training. This will ensure all departments are protecting & serving our country. https://t.co/qD0Vrp95Jp

Law enforcement have spoken out and so have the American people – we need some changes. I’ve always said we affect the greatest change when we all work together.   I’ve been working with @GOPLeader on reforms and I hope our colleagues across the aisle will work with us as well. https://t.co/mUplnmZEwx

Needed police reform in America:  ➡️ Tie federal police funding to using best practices ➡️ Empower chiefs to permanently fire bad officers ➡️ Ensure Americans can hold law enforcement accountable in the courts for unlawful behavior https://t.co/RxPX6Tozbn
America needs police reform because regardless if your skin is black or your uniform is blue you shouldn't be afraid to walk the streets. https://t.co/wDIxrbZGAl

The qualified immunity doctrine shields officers from liability for official acts. This protection seems sensible but in some cases shields abusive officers.   We need to clarify this law to ensure officers are held accountable for violating civil rights. https://t.co/Ah6uO2JhRa

Chiefs of most major police departments have condemned Floyd’s killing & many officers are marching in solidarity with peaceful protesters.   Chiefs know their personnel and that’s why we need to give them the authority to fire bad officers & keep them off the force permanently.

Defunding the police is not the answer.   Instead let’s tie the almost $2B in federal grants received by state & local law enforcement to following best policing practices.   That means more training compliance with federal civil-rights laws and community policing.

In the wake of George Floyd’s murder leaders at every level have a duty to confront this injustice. We can do this in a measured bipartisan way by tying funding to best practices empowering police chiefs & reforming qualified immunity. Read more: https://t.co/Ah6uO30TfK
The murders of law enforcement officers in recent days are outrageous. Anyone who kills police officers should be found and prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law.

I'm in Houston marching in solidarity with George Floyd's family. We are showing you can be outraged by a black man getting murdered in police custody thankful for our First Amendment rights and angered that people are looting and rioting which goes against our American values. https://t.co/1ZLv4Ebupn
Let's focus our anger on this problem until it is fixed so we can truly honor the black men and women like George Floyd who have been murdered.

Violent riots & destruction are drowning the voices trying to address injustice.   Let’s not destroy.   Violence will not bring George Floyd or the other countless victims back. It will only make the problem worse.

No better day to talk about AI than #AutonomousVehicleDay. AI is the future and is an area the U.S. must lead on in order to remain competitive.  I’m working with @BPC_Bipartisan and @RepRobinKelly on a national AI strategy. https://t.co/iMdrYMj2wk

There’s international unity behind holding the @WHO accountable and improving it so that it’s more effective in the next major public health crisis.   President Trump should take this into account and change his position on America’s role in the W.H.O. https://t.co/MNZgGotERl

During this pandemic the leaders of  @WHO made questionable decisions especially toward the CCP but the org still serves a critical role in striving to keep our world healthy. We can disagree with the leadership of an org while supporting their mission. https://t.co/MNZgGotERl

Arresting an officer for the murder of George Floyd should have happened days ago.   Now we need answers from the Minneapolis PD about why an officer with such a problematic history was still on the force.
I have been critical of both the @WHO and Chinese Communist Party's handling of the pandemic and called for answers but turning our backs on the WHO is not the answer.

Farmers & ranchers are vital to our nation’s economy but the @USDA's requirements for the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program will exclude many cattle farmers. I joined @ConawayTX11 asking USDA for changes so these farmers will be eligible for the aid. https://t.co/BkLZNMnF2I

Communities across this country are hurting because black men shouldn’t die in police custody.   If someone isn’t fighting arrest you do not use force.   The only thing that will relieve a small piece of that hurt is justice.
The video evidence in George Floyd’s case should be enough for the Hennepin County Attorney to make arrests TODAY so this police officer can be prosecuted for murder.

Is murder not a crime in Hennepin County?   The almost weekly abuses of power in cases like George Floyd’s murder must be addressed swiftly.   It shouldn’t take days to arrest offenders involved in heinous crimes caught on tape. https://t.co/HUgd5RoWhq

I represent a district that includes 29 counties stretches 2 time zones & spans almost 600 miles from 1 end to the other. I discussed representing the southwest border region of Texas with @GUPolitics students on @FlyOnTheWallPod. Listen in: https://t.co/4lk4T6X0Z0

I've joined the lawsuit against Speaker Pelosi because the American people have entrusted Members of Congress with the immense duty of representing their needs & their voices. That doesn’t cease in a pandemic. In fact it is even more important during a crisis. https://t.co/Jt1g4jceKf
On @foxnewsradio now with @kilmeade! We're talking about #HongKong and more.  Tune in here➡️https://t.co/LLUKwYpLzF

A native of my hometown former POW dedicated public servant and lifelong Texan Sam Johnson fought for his country on the battlefield and in the halls of Congress. He was a tireless advocate on behalf of his constituents for over 2 decades. He will be greatly missed!

The U.S. has to look ahead on cybersecurity tech & AI and lead. I’ve long advocated for federal investments in these areas because it is the future of our economy and our world. Check out more of my discussion with @MattDevost and @ooda: https://t.co/ewkiUo2Qco

Claiming you have access to info that you do not have is a lie.   Sources are a critical part of intelligence gathering and I would encourage all intelligence officials to carefully consider how they portray what they “receive” and instead stick to the facts. @MorningsMaria https://t.co/dNchAgjVOM
George Floyd's death is absolutely horrendous.  The police officer was rightfully fired but now he should be arrested.   This is not what our country represents.

Want to hear about my time in the CIA and my take on “solving real problems?” I joined students from @GUPolitics on their latest episode of @FlyOnTheWallPod to discuss this and more. Check it out: https://t.co/4lk4T6X0Z0

As we begin to climb out of the dark tunnel we’ve been in we have to think about advancement not recovery. In other words how do we come out of this better than before. Tune in now to watch my discussion with @thehill and @SCClemons https://t.co/XSi8Bh5KJW

The future of our intelligence community looks much brighter now that @RepRatcliffe will serve as Director of National Intelligence.   John is bringing tremendous value to this position. I look forward to seeing his leadership.  https://t.co/lBPjq4M59t
@birnbaum_e @issielapowsky It will be great to talk cybersecurity and tech with you and @issielapowsky!
@SCClemons @BobCusack @thehill @TheHillEvents Looking forward to joining!

China criticized Taiwan really?   Taiwan is a thriving democracy that effectively dealt with COVID-19.    CCP should allow Taiwan to be an observer at the WHO & take responsibility for their role in this pandemic.   https://t.co/hwKXj6ylZ5

Millions of seniors reside in long-term care facilities that have faced unique challenges during #COVID19. I joined @michaelcburgess in urging @HHSgov to provide these facilities with funds through the Public Health and Social Services Emergency Fund. Read more: https://t.co/SkCxpTLrUE

.@WHO has been an ally but its recent attitudes toward China throughout #COVID19 has undermined the organization’s reputation. China has skirted answering questions & WHO has allowed it. I’m asking other member states to help us get answers:  https://t.co/4UgwLaYdJi

Al Qaeda was responsible for the Pensacola attack. They are clearly still a threat to the U.S.  We must increase vigilance to prevent future al Qaeda or lone wolf terrorist attacks.  https://t.co/dHINl7UETx

The way we solve problems is by empowering people not the government. Unfortunately the HEROES Act does the exact opposite.   This partisan legislation tries to centralize power within the federal government by encouraging people to stay unemployed. https://t.co/7qGQgl2H4g

The rule change will make politics more partisan by removing the need for legislators to be together negotiating. If Americans can return to work at grocery stores restaurants & fire stations then members can return to vote in a safe healthy way. https://t.co/MRPK9PGeDS

The definition of “essential” plays a huge role in the movement of goods across the Mexican border. We need a uniform definition to help both economies & keep trade & supply chains moving. @RepCuellar & I wrote @SecPompeo & Mexico's foreign minister @m_ebrard calling for clarity.

Talked to @News4SA about the critical Coronavirus relief Congress has passed for American families and businesses with bipartisan action. Sadly now partisan politics seem to be getting in the way of our next steps forward. https://t.co/jAY5ABofR8

The Chinese misinformation efforts are designed to:   ➡️Save face with their own people ➡️Distract the world from their lack of transparency  ➡️Drive a wedge between the U.S. & our allies  It is part of their scheme to become the next world power. https://t.co/R3YUiiYacY

How far will the Chinese Communist Party go to make its economy the most influential in the world? Based on the CCP’s attempt to rewrite the history of #COVID19 pandemic they are willing to use aggressive disinformation to achieve their aim. https://t.co/ufjlbk1X6B

The Chinese Communist Party is again prioritizing their image above world health.   They're stalling @WHO from returning to China to find the #COVID19 origins. These stall tactics are probably due to CCP fears that the real Covid-19 case #s will be public. https://t.co/V1Z1Inaj6l

Chinese Communist Party-backed businesses have sought to steal American intellectual property for decades.    Now the CCP has deteriorated to a new low by targeting efforts to develop a vaccine and treatment for #COVID19.  https://t.co/633VjZUHu4

The Taliban just like the Chinese Communist Party and the Kremlin is using the #COVID19 pandemic to advance their own goals while jeopardizing the lives of innocent civilians.   https://t.co/WYNz2L7Vjg

.@RepRatcliffe’s experience as a U.S. Attorney and cybersecurity expert in Congress is what we need in someone representing the men and women in the intelligence community. I joined @foxandfriends to discuss why my friend and colleague should be the next DNI. https://t.co/9r12TPsdWM

American adversaries are using hackers to steal info and harm efforts to combat #COVID19.    This is insane.    This is what oppressive governments do when seeking global dominance.    https://t.co/Q8oxpIxWQh

Our next DNI must have knowledge in cyber security an ability to prevent lone wolf terrorist attacks & the ability ensure our country is ready for the next global crisis. That person is @RepRatcliffe.    He is the leader our intelligence community needs.  https://t.co/46A0JAcTQC

Now more than ever before at a time when intelligence is being politicized by both sides in Washington the brave and resilient men and women of the intelligence community need a smart leader with a steady hand. That person is my friend @RepRatcliffe .

If @RepRatcliffe had been in Congress during the time I was an undercover CIA agent & I’d had the fortune to meet him I would have stayed in the CIA because I would have found someone I trusted to make our nation’s laws & support what we were doing.  https://t.co/46A0JAcTQC

The Iranian regime has shown disregard for global stability and even the lives of their own people. They’ve proven they can’t be trusted. Keeping the @UN arms embargo is paramount to global security which is why I joined @RepMcCaul in calling for its extension.
